        public Task(java.lang.String title)
        Creates a new task with the given title. The task will have the current time as creation date.
        Parameters:
        title -
        Throws:
        NullArgumentException - if the given title is not an instance.

      • Task

        public Task(java.lang.String title,
            Time creationDate,
            Time solveDate)
        Creates a new task with the given title, creation date and solve date.
        Parameters:
        title -
        creationDate -
        solveDate -
        Throws:
        NullArgumentException - if the given title is not an instance.
        NullArgumentException - if the given creation date is not an instance.
        NullArgumentException - if the given solve date is not an instance.
        InvalidArgumentException - if the given solve date is before the given creation date.
